content: this bulky crochet hat was designed especially for the cancer crochet challenge 2023 i chose a lavender color to honor all cancers the hope behind this challenge is that anyone who downloads this hat is pledging to make at least one to donate to charity pattern details #6 super bulky yarn us j hook 6mm instructions include 5 sizes you can also find this pattern free on my blog *this pattern and its images are copyright protected and the sole property of simply melanie jane please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or alter it to claim as your own you may sell any products you create from this pattern please credit the designer by linking online listings *
